name: twice_relationship
description: A has twice/triple what B has, find A: A = B * multiplier
templates: ${name1} has ${mult_word} as many ${item}s as ${name2}. If ${name2} has ${base_amount} ${item}s, how many does ${name1} have?
${name2} owns ${base_amount} ${item}s. ${name1} owns ${mult_word} as many. How many ${item}s does ${name1} own?
If ${name2} has ${base_amount} candies and ${name1} has ${mult_word} as many, how many candies does ${name1} have?
${name1} collected ${mult_word} as many ${item}s as ${name2} did. ${name2} collected ${base_amount} ${item}s. How many did ${name1} collect?
${name2} has ${base_amount} ${item}s in total. ${name1} has ${mult_word} that number. How many ${item}s does ${name1} have?
In their collection, ${name2} has ${base_amount} ${item}s. ${name1}'s collection is ${mult_word} as large. How many ${item}s does ${name1} have?
${name1} always collects ${mult_word} as many ${item}s as ${name2}. This week, ${name2} found ${base_amount} ${item}s. How many did ${name1} find?
